price: I Musa još reče: "Ako budete nezahvalni i vi i svi drugi na Zemlji, pa, Allah je, doista, neovisan i hvaljen."
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun
